title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings
OB: When opening the hyperlink builder and then reopening it after clicking on "OK", the title of the hyperlink builder changes to "www.actuate.com".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as "Hyperlink Options" even after reopening it.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com". 2. Click on "OK" to confirm. 3. Open the hyperlink builder again.
